thread.title: Dinosaur owns 'American Ninja Warrior' training course
thread.title_full: Dinosaur owns 'American Ninja Warrior' training course - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Dinosaur owns 'American Ninja Warrior' training course
text:
Brentwood Photography/YouTube Reko Rivera shows off his upper body strength in a T-Rex costume. Call it “Jurassic Parkour.”
Reko Rivera — a former competitor on “American Ninja Warrior” — ran through a mock couse wearing a T-Rex costume, all while the camera was rolling.
Lucky for the Internet, the footage is on YouTube in a video aptly titled "American Ninja-Saurus."
For all the elements of the course Rivera managed to conquer, his moments of failure — such as running up the warped vertical wall only to miss the edge by a few feet because of the tiny arms — are the true highlights.
The video was filmed at FTC Ninja Warrior Course in Palmetto, Fla. and captured by Brentwood Photography.
nparco@nydailynews.com
